channel.title: Text Mining on Alejo Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Text Mining on Alejo Pérez

item.title: Empirical Study for bot recognition Using Bert and BiLSTMs
item.description: Abstract: Pre-trained language models together with the finetuning practices have been experiencing a remarkable improvement at NLP tasks during the last years. These models are learnt from well-written text corpora that share characteristics of academical and literary grammar, syntax, and lexicon. Literary works, Wikipedia and News are a few examples of these. When it comes to Tweet Spambot Recognition, we must deal with a big drawback: the difficulty of leveraging the prior knowledge of language models when applied on data that belong to an especially different domain.
